ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Advice Sought
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and welcome! The Hermit is nominally level 20, ranger bufffed with a damage shield.  So, take a pumice stone along to de-buff him fo rthe first
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and welcome!

The Hermit is nominally level 20, ranger bufffed with a damage shield. So,
take a pumice stone along to de-buff him fo rthe first encounter. After
that, you can agro him early and he will fight before completin g his buff
cycle. He fights pretty hard and sometimes usues fine steel weapons. I was
never much of a solo artist at your age but spent hours there with 1 or 2
partners. You can prolly find blue aviaks and centaurs in south karaana
too. Also, you may want to look at the gnoll camp just past the zone into
Lake Rathe - at night when the skells are spawned. Cant help you with the
gargoyles - never seen em.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 48 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly



----- Original Message -----
From: "roleplay" <roleplay@...>
To: "Bards" <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 22, 2000 5:38 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Advice Sought


> From: "roleplay" <roleplay@...>
>
> I am level 24 almost 25. Where can I solo for the next level ro 2 until
26/27?
>
> I have heard the Hermit or Gargoyles but I am not sure what levels they
are.
>
> Thank you.
>
> Ranian Aleroth.
> Bard of the 24th Song.
